• XSystem4 Web Installer
  • 日本語

This is a web application to install AliceSoft's games like 'Sengoku Rance' to the home screen of your iPhone / iPad.

Installation Instructions

  1. On your PC, compress the folder containing the game data (e.g., C:\AliceSoft\Sengoku Rance) into a ZIP file.
  2. Transfer the compressed ZIP file to your iPhone / iPad, e.g. using cloud storage such as iCloud.
  3. Open this page in Safari on your iPhone / iPad and press the "Choose File" button below.
  4. Select the transferred ZIP file. Follow the on-screen instructions to install.

Touch Controls

Touch Operation Corresponding Action
Tap Click
Tap the black area outside the game screen Right-click
Long press on the screen Ctrl key
Long press outside the screen Show system menu
Swipe up and down with two fingers Wheel scroll

How to Uninstall

Long press the icon on the home screen and select "Delete Bookmark". This will also delete the game data and save data.

Notes

  • Many of the games playable with this web application are for adults.
  • This is produced by an individual unrelated to AliceSoft. Do not contact AliceSoft for support.
  • No warranty. Use at your own risk.

Add to Home Screen

From the share button at the top right , select "Add to Home Screen" → "Add", and tap the icon added to the home screen.

After adding to the home screen, you can close this page.
